name: EvoGym
discription: EvoGym is a fitness website offering expert training, state-of-the-art facilities, and personalized programs to help you achieve your health goals.

name: Triple A
discription: An e-commerce web application enables users to browse and purchase products online seamlessly. It simplifies shopping with an intuitive interface, enhancing customer convenience.
languages: HTM5, CSS3, Tailwind, Javascript, React.js, APIs services

name: My Todos
discription: It's a web application that can help you remember your tasks during your day.

name: ADOPT ME
discription: ADOPT ME is a web application for different pets. If you want to adopt a pet, you can use it to search for the pet you want.
languages: HTM5, CSS3, Bootstrap.css, Javascript , React.js, APIs services

name: GYMPANZEE
discription: GYMPANZEE is a website about gyms that provides services and offers for this gym, available trainers and their appointments.

name: Journal
discription: Journal is a dynamic website designed to keep users updated with the latest news from around the globe. It offers real-time updates, personalized topics, and an intuitive interface for seamless browsing of current events.

name: CRUD Project
discription: CRUD Project is a web app for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data with ease. It ensures efficient and organized data management.

name: Ecenter
discription: Ecenter is an online educational platform that explains the services provided by that platform, its special offers, the courses it offers, as well as lecture dates.
